ygData.subject: KoS Update
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a band of NPC s, 4 I think, that travel in North Karanas. They have killed me once with no verbal contact. I had a chance to /con the whole group last
ygData.messageBody:
There is a band of NPC's, 4 I think, that travel in North Karanas. They
have killed me once with no verbal contact. I had a chance to /con the
whole group last night and they were all conned as KoS. I will try to
get some names of this merry group later tonight, as I will be in their
area again.

Also, probably well known, but the NPC's of Permafrost will also KoS,
except for a gentleman who hangs out on the platform of some ruins. He
will not give you the time of day, but he will not KoS either.

Anyway, hope this helps somebody out.

Reanin
14th level Human SK
Cazic-Thule
